title: Navarathna Vala - Nine Gemstone Bangles in Gold
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features nine traditional gemstones (Navarathna stones) including Ruby
and Cat's Eye. Accentuated with CZ Diamonds.
features: These handcrafted bangles showcase the classic Navarathna design, believed to bring prosperity and good fortune. Each of the nine gemstones is meticulously set in a square bezel setting, interspersed with delicate floral motifs adorned with sparkling CZ diamonds. The polished gold provides a rich, warm glow that complements the gemstones' vibrant colors.
colors: Diamond (white). A harmonious blend of auspicious colors.
occasions: and special occasions where a touch of cultural elegance is desired. Also suitable as an everyday statement piece.
description: Experience the blessings of the Navarathnas with this exquisite pair of bangles. Meticulously handcrafted with attention to detail, these bangles are a testament to skilled craftsmanship and timeless design. The combination of auspicious gemstones and sparkling CZ diamonds makes it a truly special and valuable addition to your jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster.
